Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model

Class EnergyPotion

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.BaseObject
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.Item
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.model.EnergyPotion
public class EnergyPotion
extends Item
Structure for creating EnergyPotion objects. Energy potions are defined by unique name, image, tag, sell value and healAmount which defines how many percent of players Energy the created object restores. Each Energy potion can be sold or used.

  • Field Summary
